description:
Beautiful, spacious apartment in the heart of Greenpoint.  Hardwood floors, high ceilings and lots of light. Right next to the G train stop, lots of great restaurants and bars within walking distance. 

Lovely historic neighborhood with diverse culture and great architecture. Transmitter Park is at the end of the street; views of the East River and Manhattan. Also walking distance to McCarren Park, and Williamsburg.
name: Beautiful Greenpoint Apartment
review: July was perfectly lovely and her room was clean and comfortable. Just be aware that this is not genuinely an entire place to yourself - it's a railroad with someone living between you and the kitchen/bath. If that turns you off, don't stay here. If you're down to hang with a goofy roommate, go for it!
